name: Idle Champions: Baldur's Gate Dynaheir Theme Pack
summary: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Dynaheir (if you don't already have them) Baldur's Gate Dynaheir Skin An Exclusive Familiar An Epic Feat for Dynaheir 1 Epic Potion of the Gem Hunter 16 Gold Dynaheir Chests with 2 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Cards
